items.title: WhatsApp can now translate messages on iOS and Android
items.summary: The company notes that translations occur on the user's device where WhatsApp cannot see them, which means messages remain encrypted.

items.title: Sony officially announces this week’s State of Play showcase – 35-mins. of game ‘reveals and news’
items.summary:
Nintendo just hit us with one of the most epic September showcases in recent memory at the latest Direct, and now Sony is looking to get in on the action as it has just announced the next PlayStation State of Play. Last time around we got a dedicated 30-minute rundown of the new James Bond game, but this week State of Play is returning to form with a relatively sizable showcase of reveals and updates from devs across the globe, including PlayStation Studios.

items.title: Trump to meet Brazil's Lula next week after 'excellent chemistry' at UN
items.summary: UNITED NATIONS (Reuters) -U.S. President Donald Trump said he plans to meet next week with Brazilian President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva, adding that they had "excellent chemistry" during a brief encounter at the U.N. General Assembly on Tuesday. Read full story

items.title: Get up to 750 CFM clearing power with this 80V Greenworks handheld blower kit at $175 (Reg. $250, Today only)
items.summary:
As part of its Deals of the Day, Best Buy is offering the Greenworks 80V 750CFM Cordless Handheld Blower with a 2.5Ah battery at $174.99 shipped, with it even beating out the renewed offer direct from the brand’s website by $25. This model with this particular battery usually goes for $250 at full price, but you’re getting a $75 markdown through the rest of the day that lands it $5 under the usual $180 rate we’ve seen pop up over 2025 in these one-day sales. This is the best price we’ve spotted in 2025, with it only beaten out by the $170 low we last saw during Black Friday last year. What’s more, you won’t find this package at Amazon right now, with the closest models being either the 80V 500 CFM model with a 2.0Ah battery or the 80V 750 CFM backpack blower with a 4.0Ah battery.

items.title: Charge on the go with EcoFlow’s DELTA 2 Max 800W alternator charger bundle at its $1,049 low (58% off), more from $699
items.summary:
As part of its Early Prime Day Sale running through October 6, EcoFlow has launched the first of this event’s flash sales, with this one taking up to 58% off four units and lasting for 48 hours. Among the bunch, for folks living out their nomadic dreams, you can’t go wrong with EcoFlow’s DELTA 2 Max Portable Power Station bundled with an 800W alternator charger for $1,049 shipped, which beats out Amazon’s pricing by $850. This bundle normally fetches $2,498 at full price from the brand and $1,899 over at Amazon (where it’s currently listed), with discounts having only gone as low as $1,049. You’re looking at another chance to score it at its best price here, with this two-day only deal giving you a total of $1,449 off its MSRP. Head below for more on this unit and the others seeing flash savings.

items.title: Just $6 gets you this Fortnite Peely Nintendo Switch hardshell carrying case with space for up to 9 game cards today
items.summary:
PowerA’s Fortnite Peely Protection Case for Nintendo Switch

Buy for $6 (Reg. $12)

What we love

It’s hard to go wrong with this carrying case to protect your Nintendo Switch – be it the regular, OLED, or the Lite model. It’s a hardshell case with a built-in padded screen protector flap, and space to store as many as nine game cards. What we also like about this case is that it has a built-in play stand for tabletop mode, which is pretty handy.

items.title: Jackery’s Early Prime Day sale drops Explorer 1000 v2 with 200W panel to $649 (50% off) + free bundle offer, more from $129
items.summary:
Jackery has launched its Early Prime Big Deal Days sale running through October 6, with up to 65% discounts on its power stations alongside bonus savings, free gifts, and more. If you’re gearing up for fall adventures outdoors and off-grid, one of the best budget-friendly bundles to score right now is Jackery’s Explorer 1000 v2 Portable Power Station with a 200W solar panel at $649 shipped, which is also matching over at Amazon and is eligible for a FREE refurbished Explorer 290. This combination of station and add-on equipment would normally cost you $1,299 in full, though over 2025, you’ve had the chance to score it between $749 and $699 with regular discounts. If you’ve waited until now to pick it up, you’ll get it at the best price we have tracked this year, behind the $599 low that appeared last year for only a few hours. Head below for more on this bundle, the sale’s promotions, and the full lineup of deals.

items.summary:
We just spotted a deal at Amazon that drops the base variant of Razer’s latest Blade 14 (2025) gaming laptop with an RTX 5060 GPU down to $1,699.99 shipped. That’s a straight-up $700 discount on a notebook that recently hit the scene carrying a $2,300 price tag. This is the first time we’re tracking a deal on this fairly new laptop with the latest NVIDIA GPU. Additionally, the variant of this notebook with an RTX 5070 graphics card is also seeing a $700 discount now at $1,999.99 shipped, down from $2,700. These laptops, in case you’re wondering, are still fetching their full prices at Best Buy. Both variants sport a 14-inch OLED panel and are powered by the same AMD processor, and you can get more details below.

items.summary:
Amazon is now offering Madden NFL 26 on Nintendo Switch 2 on sale for $49.99 shipped so you can take gridiron action anywhere. This is a regularly $70 release you can land at nearly 30% off – today’s price is the lowest we have tracked on Amazon since its release this past spring on Switch 2. While Nintendo’s latest console might not be the first place you think to play the latest Madden, it is a great way to bring the game mobile and if it’s the only console you have access to, this is a solid price if you’re looking to land a copy now.

This gaming mouse originally retailed at $150 but has lately been fetching closer to $100, with occasional spikes up to $140 in recent weeks. It dipped to the $80 mark last month as part of a Prime-exclusive offer, but today’s deal beats that price with an additional $17 discount. items.title: This iBUYPOWER RTX 5060-powered gaming PC delivers serious value at $351 off today
items.summary:
Walmart is running a big GeForce sale with steep discounts on RTX 50-series gaming rigs at the moment, and one of the standout offers is this iBUYPOWER Element SE desktop for $849 shipped. Regularly $1,200, this deal knocks $351 off the usual price, making it the lowest we can find right now. It delivers some serious value with an RTX 5060 GPU for folks on a budget, and it even comes bundled with a keyboard and mouse so you’re ready to play out of the box. It’s among the best gaming PC deals from the GeForce Week sale, and a similarly-specced PC with a Ryzen 7 8700F config is going for $1,120 at Best Buy.

more…

items.title: Score the new Galaxy Tab S11/Ultra at up to $150 off while you still can, or up to $950 off with trades
items.summary:
As $300 price drops on the latest Galaxy Z Fold 7 roll on, the ongoing launch discounts on the new Galaxy S11 and S11 Ultra are starting to fade into the background for some. If you’re considering a new Android tablet upgrade, and haven’t already jumped in yet, you might want to think about it now while the early launch deals are still live – you can score up to $120 off Galaxy S11 and as much as $150 off the Tab S11 Ultra with no trades or bundles needed (although you can stack these discounts when trading in).

items.title: Alienware’s most-affordable Aurora 16 gaming laptop with RTX 50-series GPU back to its lowest price at $351 off
items.summary:
As part of its GeForce Week sale event, Walmart is offering Alienware’s Aurora 16 Intel-powered gaming laptop for $899 shipped. You’re looking at the base variant of this laptop with 16GB RAM and 512GB SSD that typically goes for $1,250. Today’s deal at Walmart, however, takes $351 off its usual going rate, landing it back at the lowest price we first tracked for it last month. Dell, in case you’re wondering, currently has it for $1,100 with a relatively lighter deal. Head below for more details.
